name: 2D Top Down Shooter (johnkum11)
description: Welcome to the zombie apocalypse, where the world is overrun by the undead and the only hope for survival is to eliminate them. Your mission is to take on the role of a survivor, fighting through hordes of zombies in a 2D top-down perspective. The game is a thrilling, fast-paced shooter where you must fight off the zombie and survive as long as possible.
